label: dog
caption: The big grey dog, seemingly the larger of the two, has its jaws locked onto the smaller brown dog in a playful yet firm grip. The chain collar around the grey dog's neck glints in the sunlight as it tries to assert dominance over its companion. Nearby, a child's discarded ball lies abandoned on the grassy lawn, a forgotten reminder of the rambunctious playtime that led to this unexpected canine showdown.
